name: FlutterEnv
description: Setup the Flutter environment variables from custom Flutter directory path.
helpMarkdown: For more information, take a look at the Flutter [documentation](https://flutter.io)
author: Hey24sheep

inputs.name: customPath
inputs.label: Custom Path to Flutter directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to Flutter SDK like '$(Agent.ToolsDirectory)/<yourPath>/flutter'. Do not give path to 'bin' folder.

inputs.name: flutterDirectory
inputs.label: Path to the Flutter SDK
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the Flutter SDK. Do not give path to 'bin' folder.
